msItem.title: I. Śǝrʿatä mǝnkwǝsǝnna “The Order of the Monastic Profession”
msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; name of the metropolitan; a few lines (alternating with black lines) in the incipit page; a word, a few words, a line or a few lines of the incipit of the sections and subsections; words yǝbǝl, tǝbǝl, ǝgäle, ṣälot; elements of the punctuation signs; Ethiopic numbers or their elements.
msItem.incipit: Fol. 2ra, l.1: በስመ”… ዝንቱ፡ ሥርዓት፡ አሲረ፡ ምንኵስና፨ በአስኬማ፡ ቅዱስ፡ እመቦ፡ ዘፈቀደ፡ ይልበስ፡ አስኬማ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ዝውእቱ፡ ለምንኵስና፡ ይንበር፡ ማእከለ፡ መነኮሳት፡ ፩፡ ዓመተ፡ ያመክር፡ ርእሶ፡ ወይትገሠጽ፡ ብዙኃ፨
msItem.explicit: Fol. 70va, l.3: …ወግሩም፡ እስመ፡ ሙሉእ፡ ወቡሩክ፡ ስብሐተ፡ ስምከ፨ ኦሥሉስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ኵሎ፡ ጊዜ፡ ይእዜኒ፧ ወዘልፈኒ፧ ወለዓለምመ፧ ዓለም፧ አሜን፧ ወአሜን፨
msItem.note: Fol. 2ra: Requirements for the novitiate; preparation of the ritual: በስመ”… ዝንቱ፡ሥርዓት፡ አሲረ፡ ምንኵስና፨ በአስኬማ፡ ቅዱስ፡ እመቦ፡ ዘፈቀደ፡ ይልበስ፡ አስኬማ፡ ቅዱስ Fol. 3va: Investigation of the candidate, and rules given to him to observe as a monk: ትእዛዘ፡ መነኮሳት፡ ኦእኁ፡ ለምንት፡ መጻእከ… Fol. 7va: Continuation; further directives for the ritual: ትእዛዘ ፡ መነኵስና። ለገቢረ፡ ሠናይ፡ ናሁ፡ ጾርከ፡ አስኬማ፡ ዘመላእክት… Fol. 10vb: Prayer of thanksgiving over the girdle: ጸሎተ፡ አኰቴት። ለማዕሰር፡ ይብል፡ ካህን፨ Fol. 11va: Prayer of the tonsure: በስመ”… ዝንቱ፡ ሥርዓት፡ ዘመነኮሳት፡ ሕገ፡ ምንኵስና… Fol. 15ra: Prayer of thanksgiving over the monastic habit: ጸሎተ፡ አኰቴት። ወካዕበ፡ ላዕለ፡ መልበስ፡ ነአኵተከ፡ ኪያከ። Fol. 15vb: Prayer over the girdle: ጸሎተ፡ ላዕለ፡ ቅናት፡ አምላክ፡ ዘለዓለም፡ ዘይጼዓን፡ ዲበ፡ ሰረገላ… Fol. 18vb: Blessing of the girdle: ጸሎተ፡ ቡራኬ፡ ላዕለ፡ ቅናት፡ እግዚእነ፡ ወመድኃኒነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፨ ዘእምብዝኃ፡ ምሕረቱ… Fol. 20rb: New Testamental readings: ወጳውሎስ፡ ኤፌሳን፡ ጽንዑ… Fol. 25rb: Prayer over the candidate: ወእምድኅሬሁ። ሰላም፡ ወትጸርኅ፡ ወትብል፡ ኪርያላይሶን፡ ፵፩፡ ጊዜ… Fol. 25va: Prayer while putting on the girdle: ወተአሥር፡ ሐቌሁ፡ በቅናት፡ ዘአዲሞ። Fol. 25vb: Prayer while putting on the clothes: ወታቀንቶ፡ ወታለብሶ፡ ልብስ… Fol. 26ra: Prayer of thanksgiving after putting on the clothes: ወትብል፡ ጸሎተ፡ አኰቴት፡ እምድኅረ፡ ለብስ፡ ልብስ… Fol. 27ra: Prayer after putting on the girdle: ጸሎት፡ እምድኅረ፡ አቅነትከ፡ መነኮሳት… Fol. 27rb: Prayer over the virgins: ጸሎት፡ ላዑለ፡ ደናግል፡ ወለያልያት[sic]… Fol. 28ra: Directives for the ritual: ትብል፡ ቅዱስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ቅዱስ… Fol. 28vb: Precepts to be read to the monk: እምድኅረ፡ ፈጸምከ፡ ምንኵስና፡ ላዕሌሆሙ… Fol. 37ra: Directives for the ritual: በስመ”… እምቅድመ፡ ኵሉ፡ ትጼሊ፡ ጸሎተ፡ ወንጌል… Fol. 37vb: Prayer over the monastic cap (qobʿ): ጸሎተ፡ ላዕለ፡ ቆብዕ… Fol. 40ra: Biblical readings: ጳውሎስ፡ ለሰብአ፡ ዕብራውያን… Fol. 45va: Narration concerning St. Anthony: በስመ”…ድኅረ፡ ፈጸምከ፡ ላዕሌሁ፡ ዘንተ፡ ቃለ፡ ነገረ፡ ዘአባ፡ እንጦንስ… Fol. 46rb: Directive for the ritual about the scapular (ʾaskema): በስመ”… ዝንቱ፡ስእለታት፡ ዘይትነበብ፡ ላዕለ፡ አስኬማ… Fol. 46va: Prayer over the scapular: ወትብል፡ ዘንተ፡ ጸሎት፡ ላዕለ፡ አስኬማ… Fol. 47va: Biblical readings: ለሰብአ፡ ገላትያ። Fol. 51ra: Prayer: ወእምድኅሬሁ ፡ ትብል፡ ዘንተ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ እግዚእነ… Fol. 51va: Prayer: ጸሎት፡ ወካዕበ፡ እምድኅሬሁ፡ እግዚአብሔር… Fol. 51vb: Prayer over virgins: መነኮሳት፡ ደነግል፡ ይትዓሰሩ፡ በአስኬማ… Fol. 52va: Prayer of virgins: ጸሎት፡ ዘደነግል። Fol. 52vb: Prayer over monks: ጸሎት፡ ላዕለ፡ መነኮሳት። Fol. 54ra: Prayer over the would-be nun: ጸሎት፡ ላዕለ፡ ብእሲት፡ እንተ፡ ትፈቅድ ፡ ኀቤከ… Fol. 55rb: Biblical readings: ዘጢሞቴዎስ። etc. Fol. 57va: Prayer over the scapular: ጸሎት፡ ላዕለ፡ አስኬማ። Fol. 59vb: Prayer over the scapular: ጸሎት፡ ላዕለ፡ አስኬማ። Fol. 60vb: Prayer: ወእምድኅሬሁ። ወታነብብ፡ ዘንተ፡ ጸሎተ፡ ወበል፡ እግዚኦ፡ አምላከ፡ ኃያላን… Fol. 63ra: Prayer (n°1): እግዚእ፡ እግዚኦ፡ መናፍስት፡ ወለኵሉ፡ ፍጥረት… Fol. 65ra: Prayer (n°2): ወካዕበ፡ ናስተበቍዕ፡ ወነኃሥሥ፡ በኅቤከ፡ እግዚእነ፡ ኢያሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ። Fol. 65vb: Prayer n°3: ሣልስ፡ ጸሎት። ዘይትነበብ፨ Fol. 66va: Prayer n°4: ራብዕ፡ ጸሎት። ዘይትነበብ፨ Fol. 68vb : Prayer n°5: ኃምስ፡ ጸሎት። ዘማቴዎስ፡ እግዚእ፡ እግዚኦ… Fol. 69vb: Absolution of the Son (Fǝtḥat zä-wäld): ፍትሕት፡ ዘወልድ፡ ወምላእ፡ ላዕሌነ…

note.p: In the incipit the text is called Śǝrʿatä asirä mǝnkwǝsǝnna.

msItem.note: The Ms. contains a text different from Mss.AQM-010andDD-041. It begins with the words: Śǝrʿatä asirä mǝnkwǝsǝnna...

Made of 71.0 folios, of which blank 71v, in 10.0 quires (A+9).
18.0 17.0 4.5

signatures.note: Undecorated quire marks are written twice: one in the left upper corner and one in the left lower corner of the first and last fol. of the quire: fols. 2r, 10r, 17v, 18r, 25v, 26r, 33v, 34r, 41v, 42r, 49v, 50r, 57v, 58r, 65v, 66r.

supportDesc.condition: The Ms. has been rebound and resewn with a thread of vegetal origin. The boards have been re-utilized; the back board is cracked and has a set of previous sewing attachment holes. Some fols. satined with wax. The bottom edge of fols. 1-2 is damaged by rodents. A hole has been carefully amended on fol. 49.

layout.ab: The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.

list.item: II. Four dot asterisk; nine dot asterisk; five red and black dot vertical colon;
III. Double nine dot asterisks, with chain of black and red dots in between (e. g. fol. 15vb); three nine dot asterisks (e. g. fol. 37ra).

Fol. 45vb-46r: Ownership note.Fol. 45vb: ዝመጽሐፍ፡ ዘማርያም፡ አሸር፡ መትራ፡ ደብረ፡ አለማ፡ ይእቲ፡ ዘተሣየጦ፡ በንዋየዋ፡ [fol.46r] ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ማኅበር፡ አሸር፡ መትራ፡ ደብረ፡ አላማ፡ ይእቲ
The note is written in a very crude hand, partly in red. It states that the Ms. was purchased for the money of the church of Maryam ʾAšär Mät(ǝ)ra Däbrä ʾAläma.

- The title of the work, መ/መነኰሳት, is written on a slip of paper stuck to the front board. - A word ተአም[ር] is written, in black paint, on the front board. It probably refers to the content of the ms. from which the board originates. - Omitted letters or words written interlineally, occasionally over erasures: fols. 5va, 10rb, 18ra, 20ra, 21ra, 21rb, 22vb, 25va, 31va, 41ra, 42ra, 42vb, 50r, 59rb, 62rb. - Erasures: 22vb, 24r, 37va. - Corrections over erasures: 40ra, 47ra. - Cues for the rubricator: fols. 10v, 11r, 12r, 14r, 27r, 28r. - Names erased from fols. 11vb, 12ra. - An extensive note erased from fol. 71r. - Minor notes, writing exercises (in Ethiopic syllabary), doodles: fols. 1rv, 2r, 34r, 43r, 45vb, 68v.

binding.decoNote: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather (quarter cover). Two pairs of sewing stations.
Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover.
Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (at least 2 tools were used: triple line fillet, fourfold line fillet).

origin.origDate: Metropolitan of Ethiopia (ṗaṗasǝnä) ʾabba Sinoda (in tenure 1671/72-1692) is mentioned on fol. 70rb. The Patriarch of Alexandria (liqä ṗaṗasǝnä) is wrongly (?) identified as ʾabba Sinoda, fol. 70rb.
